00044 function PrintFilterGroupIPsForms()
00045 {
00046     global $View;
00047     
00048     if ($View->Controller($output, 'GetGroupCount')) {
00049         $count= $output[0];
00050         ?>
00051         <tr>
00052             <td class="none" colspan="2">
00053                 <?php
00054                 echo _TITLE2('Number of filter groups').':'.$count;
00055                 ?>
00056             </td>
00057         </tr>
00058         <?php
00059         for ($group= 1; $group <= $count; $group++) {
00060             if ($group % 2 == 1) {
00061                 ?>
00062                 <tr id="groupbox">
00063                 <?php
00064             }
00065             ?>
00066             <td class="group">
00067                 <?php
00068                 echo _TITLE2('Group').' '.$group.':';
00069                 ?>
00070                 <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00071                     <input style="display:none;" type="submit" name="Add" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00072                     <select name="IPs[]" multiple style="width: 250px; height: 100px;">
00073                     <?php
00074                     if ($View->Controller($ips, 'GetGroupIpList', $group)) {
00075                         for ($i = 0; $i < count($ips); $i++) {
00076                             ?>
00077                             <option value="<?php echo $ips[$i] ?>"><?php echo $ips[$i] ?></option>
00078                             <?php
00079                         }
00080                     }
00081                     ?>
00082                     </select>
00083                     <input type="submit" name="Delete" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Delete') ?>"/><br />
00084                     <input type="text" name="IPToAdd" style="width: 250px;" maxlength="31"/>
00085                     <input type="submit" name="Add" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00086                     <input type="hidden" name="GroupToChange" value=<?php echo $group ?> />
00087                 </form>
00088             </td>
00089             <?php
00090             if ($group % 2 == 0) {
00091                 ?>
00092                 </tr>
00093                 <?php
00094             }
00095             ?>
00096             <?php
00097         }
00098         if ($count % 2 == 1) {
00099             ?>
00100             </tr>
00101             <?php
00102         }
00103     }
00104 }

00108 function PrintFilterAuthIPForms()
00109 {
00110     global $View, $Row;
00111     
00112     $conf= array(
00113         'exceptionlist' =>  array(
00114             'title'     => _TITLE2('Whitelist'),
00115             'color'     => 'white',
00116             ),
00117         'bannedlist'    =>  array(
00118             'title'     => _TITLE2('Blacklist'),
00119             'color'     => 'gray',
00120             ),
00121         );
00122     ?>
00123     <tr id="groupbox">
00124     <?php
00125     foreach ($conf as $name => $listconf) {
00126         ?>
00127         <td style="background-color: <?php echo $listconf['color'] ?>;">
00128             <?php echo $listconf['title'].':' ?>
00129             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00130                 <input style="display:none;" type="submit" name="AddAuthIp" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00131                 <select name="AuthIPs[]" multiple style="width: 250px; height: 100px;">
00132                 <?php
00133                 if ($View->Controller($ips, 'GetAuthIpList', $name)) {
00134                     for ($i = 0; $i < count($ips); $i++){
00135                     ?>
00136                     <option value="<?php echo $ips[$i] ?>"><?php echo $ips[$i] ?></option>
00137                     <?php
00138                     }
00139                 }
00140                 ?>
00141                 </select>
00142                 <input type="submit" name="DeleteAuthIp" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Delete') ?>"/><br />
00143                 <input type="text" name="AuthIPToAdd" style="width: 250px;" maxlength="31"/>
00144                 <input type="submit" name="AddAuthIp" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00145                 <input type="hidden" name="List" value=<?php echo $name ?> />
00146             </form>
00147         </td>
00148         <?php
00149     }
00150     ?>
00151     </tr>
00152     <?php
00153 }
00154 
00155 if ($_POST['Create']) {
00157     $View->Controller($Output, 'CreateNewGroup', $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group']);
00158 }
00159 else if ($_POST['Delete']) {
00160     foreach ($_POST['IPs'] as $Ip) {
00161         $View->Controller($Output, 'DelIpFilterGrp', $Ip);
00162     }
00163 }
00164 else if ($_POST['Add'] && $_POST['IPToAdd']) {
00165     $View->Controller($Output, 'SetIpFilterGrp', $_POST['GroupToChange'], $_POST['IPToAdd']);
00166 }
00167 else if ($_POST['DeleteAuthIp']) {
00168     foreach ($_POST['AuthIPs'] as $Ip) {
00169         $View->Controller($Output, 'DelIp', $_POST['List'], $Ip);
00170     }
00171 }
00172 else if ($_POST['AddAuthIp'] && $_POST['AuthIPToAdd']) {
00173     $View->Controller($Output, 'AddIp', $_POST['List'], $_POST['AuthIPToAdd']);
00174 }
00175 
00176 $View->SetSessionFilterGroup();
00177 
00178 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00179 
00180 $View->PrintFilterGroupForm();
00181 ?>
00182 <table id="nvp">
00183     <tr class="oddline">
00184         <td class="title">
00185             <?php echo _TITLE2('Create filter group').':' ?>
00186         </td>
00187         <td>
00188             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00189                 <input type="submit" name="Create" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Create') ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to create a new group?') ?>')"/>
00190             </form>
00191         </td>
00192         <td class="none">
00193             <?php
00194             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX2('This button creates a new web filter group identical to the active group.'));
00195             ?>
00196         </td>
00197     </tr>
00198 </table>

00200     <?php
00201     PrintFilterGroupIPsForms();
00202     PrintFilterAuthIPForms();
00203     ?>
00204 </table>
00205 <?php
00206 PrintHelpWindow(_HELPWINDOW("Groups are used to grant or revoke certain privileges to IPs, such as which web sites or file types to allow or deny. ComixWall comes with 4 predefined groups by default. However, the web filter is capable of having any number of IP groups.
00207 
00208 Predefined groups and their basic features are as follows:
00209 Filter Group 1:
00210 <ul class='nomargin'><li class='nomargin'>All IPs not defined in other groups are considered in this group by default,</li><li class='nomargin'>Group members are allowed to browse the web according to group configuration,</li><li class='nomargin'>If not specifically disabled, all files are scanned for viruses.</li></ul>
00211 Filter Group 2:
00212 <ul class='nomargin'><li class='nomargin'>Members of this group have unrestricted access to the web,</li><li class='nomargin'>File downloads are not scanned for viruses.</li></ul>
00213 Filter Group 3:
00214 <ul class='nomargin'><li class='nomargin'>Members of this group are completely denied of any web access.</li></ul>
00215 Filter Group 4:
00216 <ul class='nomargin'><li class='nomargin'>Members of this group have more privileges than Group 1 members, because they can download files without any restrictions,</li><li class='nomargin'>Rest of the configuration for this group is similar to Group 1.</li></ul>
00217 You can add IP or network addresses to groups. If there is another group with the same entry, it is deleted from that group first, i.e. an IP address can be a member of only one group.
00218  
00219 The format of ip ranges is Start IP address-End IP address, such as 192.168.1.1-192.168.1.253. And that of subnets is IP address/Subnet mask, such as 192.168.1.0/255.255.255.0.
00220 
00221 White and black lists give you other methods of allowing or denying certain IP addresses access to the web without needing to add them to any group.
00222 
00223 This web interface does not provide an option to delete filter groups. But you can always delete groups on the command line."));
00224 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'footer.php');
00225 ?>
